title: What To Do When Someone Dies
description: What do you do when your husband dies in a horrific car accident? How should you react when you learn another woman was by his side? Where do you turn when the image of your perfect marriage is lying in tatters? For grieving widow Ellie Falkner there is only one option. Find out exactly who Milena Livingstone was and what she was doing in Greg’s car that night. But is Ellie ready for the shocking truth about her husband’s death?
author: Nicci French
